verses.text: I will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* at all \w times|strong="H6256"\w*: his \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \add shall\add* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \add be\add* in my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.\f + \fr 34.1 \ft Abimelech: or, Achish\f*

My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall make her \w boast|strong="H1984"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: the \w humble|strong="H6035"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \add thereof\add*, and be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.
O \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with me, and let us \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.
I \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and he \w heard|strong="H6030"\w* me, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* me from all my \w fears|strong="H4035"\w*.

They \w looked|strong="H5027"\w* unto him, and were \w lightened|strong="H5102"\w*: and their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* were not \w ashamed|strong="H2659"\w*.\f + \fr 34.5 \ft were lightened: or, they flowed unto him\f*

This poor \w man|strong="H6041"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add him\add*, and \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* him out of all his \w troubles|strong="H6869"\w*.

The \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w encampeth|strong="H2583"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him, and \w delivereth|strong="H2502"\w* them.

O \w taste|strong="H2938"\w* and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: \w blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \add that\add* \w trusteth|strong="H2620"\w* in him.

O \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, ye his \w saints|strong="H6918"\w*: for \add there is\add* no \w want|strong="H4270"\w* to them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him.

The young \w lions|strong="H3715"\w* do \w lack|strong="H7326"\w*, and suffer \w hunger|strong="H7456"\w*: but they that \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall not \w want|strong="H2637"\w* any \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add thing\add*.

\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me: I will \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* you the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

What \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is he that\add* \w desireth|strong="H2655"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, \add and\add* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \add many\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, that he may \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*?
\w Keep|strong="H5341"\w* thy \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* from \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w guile|strong="H4820"\w*.

\w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, and \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* it.

The \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add are\add* upon the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, and his \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \add are open\add* unto their \w cry|strong="H7775"\w*.

The \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* against them that \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, to cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w remembrance|strong="H2143"\w* of them from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\add The righteous\add* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w delivereth|strong="H5337"\w* them out of all their \w troubles|strong="H6869"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w nigh|strong="H7138"\w* unto them that are of a \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; and \w saveth|strong="H3467"\w* such as be of a \w contrite|strong="H1793"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.\f + \fr 34.18 \ft unto…: Heb. to the broken of heart\f*\f + \fr 34.18 \ft of a contrite…: Heb. contrite of spirit\f*

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \add are\add* the \w afflictions|strong="H7451"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w delivereth|strong="H5337"\w* him out of them all.
He \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* all his \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*: not \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of \w them|strong="H2007"\w* is \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*.

\w Evil|strong="H7451"\w* shall \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: and they that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H0816"\w*.\f + \fr 34.21 \ft desolate: or, guilty\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w redeemeth|strong="H6299"\w* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: and none of them that \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in him shall be \w desolate|strong="H0816"\w*.\f + \fr 34.22 \ft desolate: or, guilty\f*
